summary: Defines a simulation scenario that models an enhanced postnatal care (PNC) environment for maternal and perinatal health analyses. The class supplies methods to generate scenario-specific parameters, log the configuration, and compose the collection of health system and disease modules required to run the model.
business_intent: Enable researchers and policymakers to assess the health impact and cost‑effectiveness of scaling up postnatal care services, supporting evidence‑based decisions for maternal and child health programs.
